data.title: Welcome To Utah State University
data.meta_description: Founded in 1888, Utah State University is Utah's only land grant institution, serving over 28,000 students in Logan and around the state at Statewide Campuses, as well as at USU Eastern. Known for its robust and cutting edge research, Utah State challenges students to pursue academic opportunities that will change the world.

Who We Are

Utah's own state university. No matter where you live, or who you are, Utah State University is built for all. We are innovators and doers. We create impact.
